daraganne kohomada mama thaniyen adapu wara ananthayi apramanayi.anthimata mama thiranayak gaththa aadareta samudila antharayaka shalyakarmayata muhuna denna.eeka asarthaka wunoth jiwithen samuganna.eeth mama mage aadare issaraha asarana wuna aya eka hithinma mata samudima prathikshepa kara.ena hatiyakata muhuna denna aadare porondu wuna.ithin mama hitha dadikaran shalyakarmayata mama sudanam kiyala kiyanna yaddi ammayi thaththayi sinhala wedakamata yomuwenna thiranaya karala thibuna.ee polgahawela weda gedarak gana ammata aaranchi wela thibuna nisa.mage jiwithe ada thiyena thathweta berala dunne ethanin.

owu ithin mona nadagama natuwath depaththema inna manthriwarunata pagawa , komis ,niwasa ,wani dewal walin miliyana gananin labena bawa badumkara siddhiyen peni yana athara miliyana 15 wadi watinakamak sahitha wahana parmit athulu thawa thawa waraprasada rajayen labagannawa , issara me horakam saha kolam hangi hangi kalata ada eewa sadharanikaranaya karamin eegana wedhikawala maha lokuwata katha karanawa , jawaram karayan aandu paksha manthrilata horakam karaganima sadaha miliyana ganan pagawa dena athara , wiruddha paksha manthrilatath parlimenthuwe mewa gana kathakirimen walakila inna ekata miliyana gananin gewim karana bawa 118 list eken penenawa , duppathage wahanaya wana thrirodha rathayatath api laksha 4 kata wadi pramanayak badu lesa gewanawa.
